Fun game with old style mechanics. The movement in this game is unlike any other and makes the game very interesting. The  different grenades offer a very methodical way of playing the game and gives it another layer. The AWP is a very strong gun that can turn the tide of any game. Learning sprays on this game is a good way of getting better if you have bad aim. This game is a lot about perfection/doing the right things at the right time. 10/10 would recommend very fun game.
Es ist halt CSGO, jeder kennt es und es ist spielbar. Neutral ist ein guter Ausdruck für das Spiel.
